name: Born of the Bones of the Earth

description.value:
Your dominion is over stone and soil, the pillars holding up the stage of history's great legends. You gain the Energized Spark feat for your choice of earth or fire. When you critically succeed on a Strike and the target of the critical hit is standing on a surface of earth or stone, the target is driven down and mired in the ground. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Immobilized] and must succeed at an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Escape] attempt against your class DC to end the immobilization. The creature doesn't become stuck if it is incorporeal, is liquid (like a water elemental or some oozes), has a burrow speed, or could otherwise escape without effort.

When you Spark Transcendence while standing on a surface of earth or stone, you can choose to shatter the surface in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10], making it difficult terrain. You are not affected by this difficult terrain.
